column3: â€œThis strain should be called Pain Be Gone"...I'm VERY impressed with it!  I was suffering the queen mother of all migraines - the absolute worst I've experienced in years - as well as pretty bad nausea.  Being on a self-imposed tolerance break
column4: I've been taking pills all day and felt like I was getting zero pain relief.  Nada.  Zip.  Zilch.  All it did was make me feel doped up. Finally I said "f--- this!" and reach...â€"

column3: â€œI've been trying to figure out why the fuck smurfs are blue for over an hour now and all I've come up with is that I want pizza.â€

â€œLoving this even more than I thought I would!  Gotta be in my top 10 or maybe even 5 strains.  This hits hard and fast and has a very narcotic type knock you out feeling.  First time I had this I actually went to bed with my cell phone wireless headset wrapped around my neck.... Lol! And didn't even realize it until I woke up the next morning.  Yep, this one knocks me for a nice loop.â€

â€œO my, have I fought the urge to go to sleep. Pitbull def true indica from what I have been reading of them. Felt like spears were being run thru my head when I woke up this AM. Pain 7, nausea 4-5, dizzy 4-5. Medicated @ 1100 or so. Bout 5 min to start working if that. Pain gone; nausea bout 3? NO ANXIETY/PARANOIA (super huge for me).  Super relaxed. Very strong head buzz but not too strong. Body high dang near perfec...â€

â€œHigh cbd/cbn strain. Had a friend who grew 4 crops. He won't grow it anymore. Only reason being is the cosmetic quality of this strain. Taste Alittle like hay and smells Alittle funny but, Damn. It gets you medicated (couch lock) stress free, subsidies the pain in my hips and back. If it wasn't for the cosmetics he would continue this strain. If your looking for medication over taste this strain is good for those on ...â€
â€œSaw this at a local dispensary and literally let out a holy shit" when I saw this bud ;-) EXTREMELY large fluffy buds. Very pretty
column5: light green with lots of spindly red hairs. Did NOT disappoint! Bought specifically for migraine relief on this particular occassion. Smoked .5g out of a bong and was lit. Migraine was gone
column6: body was warm and tingly (but was mostly tingly in my mouth and tongue? weird...). Extrem...â€"

column3:
â€œVery floral smelling, like rose petals with hints of strawberry, spice, cayenne, but a true madman. Dark, musky, lung expanding, head rushing exhale. Great for pain, even my nagging turf toe was no match for it. 

     Better than NyQuil, take only at bedtime, as that's where you are heading. You won't be doing any heavy math either. Put on the tv and wake up to the Poltergeist, screen. In other words, does what I ...â€

â€œMigraine returned last night. It was around my normal bedtime. Pain lvl 5, nausea 4 & dizziness 4 when I decided to medicate. Wasn't awake long after I did; was asleep within an hour. Do remember Pitbull all but completely curing the pain/nausea. Also remember having absolutely no anxiety/paranoia before falling asleep. Not sure how much of it was Pitbull & how much just me being tired. I knocked the hell out soon af...â€
â€œTried this as CO2 oil via Avitas. Does the business! Definitely not one for the daytime, unless you have NOTHING to do.â€

â€œPitbull is from Stoney Girl Gardens Portland, OR. This stuff is for serious users only. THC content sometimes as high as 36%. This stuff knocks you on your ass. It was like bullet to the head, instantly high! This is some great third generation ganja! Great work breeders.â€
â€œUnique taste, Very deceiveing looks like nothing special. But let me Assure you my fellow Leafly patrons. This Strain will KICK YOUR @$$.  SUPER STRONG.â€

â€œThis strain has become my go-to for pain relief. I suffer from chronic, intractable pain as a result of a spinal cord injury so I was looking for a strain that would help relieve the pain. On exhale, I was already feeling less pain. Three bowls in and the pain is no longer as significantly noticeable. Very mellow high, but still strong enough to kick your ass to bed if you need it to. I absolutely love this strain.â€
â€œOne of my most favorite meds. Instant relief, all worries melt away, but comfortably so. Does not cause any panic for me, which is vital.â€

â€œThis weekend has sucked BIG time! Caught a somewhat mild flu from my kiddo. Fri & Sat were the worst. Pain last night 7, dizzy 6, nausea 5, ditzy 600 (lol). Needed more sleep. Medicated with Pitbull bout ....uh .... I don't remember. Do remember pain getting much, much better (3) & nausea being all but gone (2) before I passed out. Grrrrrrrrrrreat for sleep!â€
â€œSuper sleepy, couch lock weedâ€
â€œVery Potent Strain.  Won't Let You Down In The Flavor Department, Until It Gets A Bit Too Cashed.â€

â€œI smoked this for the first time last night, and it is now my favorite indica by far. My joint pain disappeared and I love how well it treated my insomnia. It doesn't hurt that it smells and tastes fantastic either!â€
â€œVery Potent Strain.  Won't Let You Down In The Flavor Department, Until It Gets A Bit Too Cashed.â€

â€œOne of my most favorite meds. Instant relief, all worries melt away, but comfortably so. Does not cause any panic for me, which is vital.â€
â€œgreat for crashing at the end of a long day, really anchors you wherever you are so don't plan to get anything done. Thus is a heavy duty indica.â€

â€œI had surgery on my foot for which I should have received pain medication for, perhaps opiates..but I chose to go the herbal route with this Pitbull strain from Stoney Only. It didn't take all the pain away but it certainly gave me a nice body buzz and overall quality high. I would recommend it to anyone who likes indicas.â€

â€œI was pleased that this strain nearly lived up to its lofty namesake - Pitbull. I smoke a half a joint of this stuff late at night sitting in my car, and proceeded to jam out to some tunes w/ my Beats headphones. I can't remember when music sounded that good! It definitely hits fast, though not hard (for me) as advertised. A really chill high - it was juuuuust right. This phenotype had a pleasantly skunky footprint t...â€

â€œDecided to give this one a try.  Has a slight cheesy/sage smell.  I was pleasantly surprised with the heavy effect of complete uplifting relaxing comfort from this medicine.  A great night time sleep aid.â€

â€œit is a great strain, always very dense no matter which grow or I have tried it from. It is wonderfully relaxing, especially right before bed. 

if you have the seizures, find this strain very effective even though I usually use the CBD.

the dry mouth, for me however is intense. I would like to suggest keeping water next to your bedside.â€

â€œOk, people are saying â€˜pshh yeah smoked half a g by myself and was pretty high, but not too highâ€™ are either on crack or havenâ€™t actually smoked this. If you take a toke and arenâ€™t 6/10 baked, youâ€™re fucked. 

Highly recommend. Loudest Iâ€™ve ever had. Seriously. Smoke thisâ€

â€œgreat strain, no matter which grower it is always very dense. It takes a long time to smoke. It's very relaxing, perfect for right before bed. my seizures are usually more relieved by CBD, but for some reason this strain seems to help a lot.

like I said, it's awesome for before bed. Just make sure you have a full stomach, and some water within reach for when you fall asleep.â€

I felt very creative and I was able to come up with some good ideas, but I found myself hyper focused on them. This is just a bad high.â€

A+â€
